Sï¿½ren Vejrup Carlsen wrote:
> Dear All.
> Recently, it has become necessary to unselect some of the java classes
> during javadoc generation.
> Otherwise javadoc dies with a null-pointer exception.
> This is somewhat annoying, as the generated javadoc -docs is a nice way for
> us to become familiar with the new features in Heritrx.
> 
> The classes in question are:
>       src/org/archive/util/Http*
>       oversrc/org/apache/commons/httpclient/*

I've used the export -> Javadoc option built into Eclipse; it gives warnings
for some of our incomplete comments but no NPEs or other fatal errors.

Can you forward a stack trace or highlight the problematic file sections?

- Gordon
